verses.verse: I don't want you to be unaware, brothers, that all our fathers were under the cloud, they all went through the sea,
they all submerged themselves into Moses in the cloud and in the sea,
they all ate the same spiritual food,
and they all drank the same spiritual drink. You see, they were drinking from a spiritual rock following them. The rock was the Anointed King.
But God wasn't pleased with the majority of them. You see, their dead bodies were spread out down in the backcountry.
These things became examples for us for the "for us not to be desirers of bad things" part, just as those people also desired.
Neither become idol worshipers, just as some of them; as it has been written, (in Exodus 32:6) "The group was seated to eat and to drink and got up to be playing."
Neither should we commit sexual sin, just as some of them committed sexual sin and twenty-three thousand fell in one day.
Neither should we try to cause trouble for the Anointed King, just as some of them also tried to cause trouble and were ruined by the snakes.
Neither grumble, just as some of them grumbled and were ruined by the Destroyer.
All these things were transpiring with those people as examples. It was written toward our correction, to whom the conclusions of the spans of time have made it.
In such a way, the person who seems to have stood must see to it that he not fall.

Trouble has not taken hold of you, except human trouble. God is trustable who won't allow you to experience trouble above what you are able, but together with the trouble He will also make the departure of the "for you to be able to endure it" kind.
For this very reason, my loved ones, escape away from the idol worship.
I am talking as to focused people. You all must judge what I declare.

The cup of the conferring of prosperity that we confer prosperity on, is it not the sharing of the blood of the Anointed King? The bread that we tear, is it not the sharing of the body of the Anointed King?
Because we, the many, are one bread, one body. You see, we all take part in it from the one bread.
Look at Israel regarding the physical body. Aren't the people eating the sacrifices sharers of the altar?
So what am I declaring? That an idol is anything? Or that an idol sacrifice is anything?
No, I am declaring that what the non-Jews sacrifice, they sacrifice to demons, and not to God. I do not want you to become sharers with the demons.
You are not able to be drinking the Master's cup and the demons' cup. You are not able to be taking part in the Master's table and the demons' table.
Or do we arouse passion in the Master? We are not stronger than Him, are we?
Everything is permitted to me, but not everything is advantageous. Everything is permitted to me, but not everything is constructive.
No one must look for what is his own, but each for what is the different person's.
Eat everything sold in a meat market, investigating nothing, because of the conscience.
You see, the earth and its fullness are the Master's.
If any of the untrusting people invite you and you want to be traveling there, eat everything placed beside you, investigating nothing, because of the conscience.
But if someone says to you, "This is an idol sacrifice," do not eat it because of that person (the one who disclosed it) and the conscience. You see, the earth and its fullness are the Master's.
I say conscience, definitely not the conscience of yourself, but the conscience of the different person. You see, why is it that my freedom is being judged by another's conscience?
If I am taking part in it with generosity, why are hurtful things said about me over what I am thankful for?
So whether you eat, or drink, or anything you do, do everything for God's magnificence.
Become people not offensive to both Jewish people and Greeks, and the assembly of God,
just as I also satisfy all non-Jews in everything, not looking for what is advantageous for myself, but what is advantageous for the many, so that they might be rescued.
